forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 63, with temperatures falling to around 61 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 10 to 25 mph, with gusts as high as 31 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 56. West southwest wind 20 to 24 mph, with gusts as high as 31 mph.

weather_report:
In the heart of Downtown San Francisco, a contrast of serenity and briskness defines the morning. The sun stretches its arms wide, casting a gentle light over the city, with a high of around 63 anticipated today. Although the warmth is welcome, it will soften as the afternoon approaches, settling to a cool shoulders-wrapped 61. A lively westerly breeze of 10 to 25 mph resonates, its gusts reaching up to 31 mph, lending a briskness that invites you to embrace the outdoors but also to be mindful of the chill.

While the skies seem to maintain a clear and sunny disposition at first glance, a closer look hints at the remnants of a marine layer, that gentle fog that often hugs the coastline, just lingering near the iconic Golden Gate Bridge. For those stepping out, a light jacket or a cozy sweater would be wise companions, especially as the evening beckons with partly cloudy skies and a low around 56. The wind whispering through the streets serves as a reminder of San Francisco's ever-changing nature. A stroll along the waterfront or a visit to one of the city’s many cafés could be just the antidote for a lively Saturday, allowing one to savor the calm yet invigorating essence of this day, nestled between the sun and the sea.
